prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

## ATMOSPHERE & MOOD
LIGHTING: Bright natural daylight - warm golden tones, soft shadows, clear visibility

## VISUAL CONTINUITY (from previous panel)
This panel continues from the previous panel.

MATCH FROM PREVIOUS PANEL:
- Art style, line weight, coloring technique
- Color palette and lighting direction
- Background style and detail level
- Props/objects: same shape, color, design

CREATE NEW:
- Fresh pose and body position for this action
- New camera angle as specified

## COMPOSITION
- Shot: wide establishing shot showing full environment and characters
- Angle: eye level, straight on view
- Location: Iso-ya (Dining Area) (A traditional sushi bar that looks cozy to humans but terrifying to spirits. The wood is actually bone.) - Visual elements: Lighting: Warm, flickering lantern light (orange/yellow), Key Object: The sushi counter made of a single giant rib bone, Atmosphere: Deceptive comfort, claustrophobic, Colors: Deep browns, reds, and gold
## CHARACTERS (PRIORITY PER CHARACTER)
Each character below has a specific priority instruction based on whether they appeared in the previous panel.
- If a character WAS in previous panel: match their appearance from previous panel exactly
- If a character was NOT in previous panel: match their CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET exactly (highest priority)
- Text descriptions are supplementary only

Only change: expression, pose, camera angle as specified below.

**Yumi** (Priority: CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET (highest - not in previous panel))
  Physical: Tall, athletic build, sharp features. One red eye, one blue eye.
  - Hair: Long silver hair tied back in a high, severe ponytail
  - Eyes: Heterochromia (Left eye Blue, Right eye Red and glowing)
  - Top: Traditional white chef's happi coat with torn sleeves
  - Bottom: Dark navy hakama pants
  - Accessories: A giant cleaver sword strapped to her back
  - Footwear: Wooden geta sandals
  Expression: confused
  Position: left of frame
**Hao** (Priority: CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET (highest - not in previous panel))
  Physical: Average height, slightly chubby build, round expressive face. messy dark hair.
  - Hair: Short black hair, slightly messy texture (MATCH REFERENCE PHOTO EXACTLY)
  - Face: Oval face shape, warm friendly smile, Asian features (MATCH REFERENCE PHOTO EXACTLY)
  - Eyes: Natural eye shape with rimless/thin-framed glasses (MATCH REFERENCE PHOTO EXACTLY)
  - Top: Bright yellow Hawaiian shirt with blue palm trees
  - Bottom: Beige cargo shorts with pockets
  - Accessories: DSLR camera on a strap around neck
  - Footwear: Red high-top sneakers
  Expression: shocked
  Position: center of frame
**Dragon Lord (Ryu)** (Priority: PREVIOUS PANEL (match exactly))
  Physical: Imposing, 7-foot tall humanoid with scales and horns.
  - Hair: Mane of flowing red fire/hair
  - Face: Patches of gold scales on cheeks, two long black horns
  - Top: Black silk kimono embroidered with gold dragons, open at chest
  - Accessories: Long pipe that smokes purple vapor
  - Build: Muscular, towering build
  Expression: neutral
  Position: right of frame
**Wasabi-Kun** (Priority: CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET (highest - not in previous panel))
  Physical: A small, green, gelatinous blob with a face.
  - Body: Translucent bright green slime body
  - Face: Simple black dots for eyes and mouth
  - Accessories: Wears a tiny white headband that says 'FIGHT'
  - Texture: Shiny and dripping
  Expression: neutral
  Position: left of frame

## ACTION & EMOTION
Yumi stumbles in from the kitchen curtain, holding her head, looking battered. She sees the Dragon Lord crying and freezes. Wasabi-Kun peeks out from behind a cup.

## VISUAL EFFECTS (if appropriate)
- Motion lines for movement
- Speed lines for action
- Sparkles/glow for magical/emotional moments
- Dramatic lighting for tension

## TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- FULL BLEED composition (art to all edges, NO white borders)
- NO text, speech bubbles, or sound effects in image
- Clean professional linework
- Expressive faces with clear emotions
- Dynamic poses with weight and balance
- Rich background detail that supports the mood

panel_data.action: Yumi stumbles in from the kitchen curtain, holding her head, looking battered. She sees the Dragon Lord crying and freezes. Wasabi-Kun peeks out from behind a cup.
